chart_description: This chart displays the condition of all pods running on a Kubernetes node, based on various criteria.

dimension_descriptions.containers_ready: The number of pods that have all containers reporting as ready.
dimension_descriptions.pod_initialized: The number of pods on the node that have been created and initialized.
dimension_descriptions.pod_ready: The number of pods on the node that have a Ready status.
dimension_descriptions.pod_scheduled: The number of pods that have been scheduled onto the node.
